author: gshimansky
msg: Applied HARMONY-2242 [DRLVM][IPF] fixed broken ipf support (20061120)
The patch changes only IPF specific code, so no testing was done.

author: asankha
msg: WS-Security example (example #3 of rampart) showing signed and encrypted messages received at a proxy service and then dispatched to a non-WS-Sec endpoint after stripping the wsse:Security header

author: kahatlen
msg: The Char & Varchar functions were not handled separately to assign to
length for the target type (in the bindExpression() method of
CastNode.java) and thus a default value of 15 was getting assigned to
it (from getColumnDisplaySize() method of DataTypeUtilities class)
Now I added a check for the string types (i.e. both Char & Varchar) in
the source type, and using the operand's maximum length or the maximum
length for that data type (whichever is minimum) and assigning it to
be the length for the target type. Thus avoiding the unwanted
truncation error caused by the default value of 15.

author: rajdavies
msg: fixed some timing issues using the Kaha Persistence Adaptor
